text: West Minot is an unincorporated village in the town of Minot, Androscoggin County, Maine, United States. The community is located at the intersection of Maine State Route 119 and Maine State Route 124, northwest of Auburn. West Minot has a post office with ZIP code 04288. ==References== Category:Villages in Androscoggin County, Maine Category:Villages in Maine
title: West Minot, Maine
